sentences.en: Bear markets often end not in capitulation but stupefaction.
sentences.cn: 熊市的尽头往往是投资者的茫然麻木而非大举溃退.

sentences.en: Passepartout, not yet recovered from his stupefaction, clung mechanically to the carpet - bag, with its enormous treasure.
sentences.cn: 路路通还有点茫茫然似的, 他只是机械地 紧压 着那个装钞票的旅行袋.

sentences.en: She did nothing but walk up and down the garden path state bordering on stupefaction.
sentences.cn: 她什么也没做,只在庭园的甬道上来往瞎走,她的心情近于昏沉麻木.

sentences.en: She revolved the'son Willoughby " through moods of stupefaction, contempt, revolt, subjection.
sentences.cn: 她以麻木 、 鄙夷 、 厌恶 、 屈从的心情反复默想着 “ 我的孩子威洛比 ”.

sentences.en: The professor was noted for his stupefaction of the students.
sentences.cn: 那位教授以上课令学生昏昏欲睡而闻名.

sentences.en: The two young men looked at each other with an air of stupefaction.
sentences.cn: 两个青年人瞠目结舌地互相望了一下.

sentences.en: Valentine witnessed this scene with a sentiment of stupefaction.
sentences.cn: 瓦朗蒂娜茫然地望着眼前这一切.

words.tran_cn: 昏迷的，不省人事的；无感觉的
